attributes.action: stop the extradition of Gary McKinnon to USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are too subservient to the USA and the legal advice is available to justify the extradition.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
